name: Malibu Pool Deck Plan – 12x17 Deck with 8ft Pool Cutout + Outdoor Living Privacy Wall
open_features: 8 ft circular pool cutout (pool designed separately by others)
4×4 posts (SP No.2) on 12×12×12 in concrete footings
Joists: 2×4 SP No.2 @ 12 in O.C. with Simpson H1A hurricane ties
2×12 stair stringers @ 12 in O.C.; stair footing 24×48×4 in depth
Privacy wall: 2×4 battens vertically, Simpson LPC4Z connections
Decking: 2×6 composite with 1/8 in gap after drying
safety_note: This plan illustrates only the deck framing and privacy wall around a pool cutout. The pool, electrical bonding, fencing, and alarms must be provided by licensed contractors per local code.
